# action

kauth-style action to be checked for permissions, e.g. KAUTH_VNODE_DELETE.

## Fields

- **vp**: File to authorize action for.
- **ctx**: Context against which to authenticate action.

items.description: Context against which to authenticate action.
items.name: ctx

title: action
